TEXT: e1: For years there has been a housing shortage in Berlin,
e2: so that using Tempelhofer Feld, which offers a lot of open space and is currently hardly developed, as living space is a sensible idea.
e3: Since the area belongs to the federal state, or the federation,

TEXT: e5: Admittedly the fields have currently become an attractive leisure park with sporting areas for many visitors and Berliners, especially in spring and summer.

TEXT: e6: If however one could find a compromise between green space and housing, then Tempelhofer Feld should definitely be made available for residential construction.
